data.scheme_name: Initiative for Development of Entrepreneurs in Agriculture (IDEA) - NYI
data.benefits: Term loan up to 75% of the project cost.
data.eligibility:
Any Graduates and Postgraduates in agriculture and allied subjects.
Any Graduates, Postgraduates from other disciplines having experience and skill to undertake Agri-Business ventures can also be considered.
data.conditions:
1. Any promoter or their units must not be a defaulter in any government scheme and /or with any bank or any other agencies.  
  2. Minimum project size should be Rs.25 lakh.
data.beneficiaries:
Any Graduates and Postgraduates in agriculture and allied subjects. 

Any Graduates, Postgraduates from other disciplines having experience and skill to undertake Agri-Business ventures can also be considered.
data.prerequisites:
1. Any promoter or their units must not be a defaulter in any government scheme and /or with any bank or any other agencies.  
  2. Promoter's contribution should be at least 25%of the project cost. 
  3. Minimum project size should be Rs.25 lakh.
data.nodal_agency: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Ltd.
data.context: Initiative for the development of entrepreneurs in agriculture (IDEA) is a scheme of NEDFL initiated by the ministry of development of the northeastern region. This scheme promotes the agri-business sector in the northeast region and assists in establishing agri-business as profitable. It also provides employment opportunities.
data.objective:
To promote Agri-business ventures in North East Region.
To assist in establishing Agri-business as a profitable venture.
To provide gainful employment opportunities in Agri-business Ventures.
data.description:
Loan Type : Composite loan (Term Loan + Working Capital)
Maximum Project Size : Rs. 25 lakh
Term Loan from NEDFi : Maximum of 75% of the project cost
Promoter’s Contribution	: 25% of the project cost
data.how_to_apply:
Applicants can apply through below mentioned link
https://www.nedfi.com/loan-for-existing-and-new-business/
data.funding_facilitator: North Eastern Development Finance Corporation Limited
data.funding_mechanism: Funds/Incentives will be released on approval of application by the concerned authority
data.website: Initiative for Development of Entrepreneurs in Agriculture (IDEA) (msme.gov.in)
data.checklist_info_a:
Photo identity and Address proof : As per RBI defined KYC guidelines.
Business Proof : Trade License/MOA & AOA/GST Registration/ITR, Partnership Deed etc. as per applicability.
Additional documents may be collected during the loan application process as per actual requirement.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: EDFi House, G. S. Road, Dispur, Guwahati
Assam Pin - 781006
Phone : +91-361-222 2200
Fax : +91-361-223 7733 / 7734
Mail : mail@nedfi.com
data.location: Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland and Tripura
data.beneficiary: Agriculture Industries - Proprietorship/Partnership Firm/Company - North Eastern Regions - All MSMEs & Non MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
